paragraphs.text: Any time i want a good laugh i read a Think Progress article it gives me a good chuckle or two and it reminds me why the radical left will always be like those anoying unruly children looking through the window making fish faces at the adults on the other side.

59fc54d81c9.title: Donald Trump is a Putin Republican.

content.subtitle: We need two parties but Republican politicians are acting like they won the lottery and could care less about everyday people.

paragraphs.text: Donald Trump is a Putin Republican. As the leader of Russia, Vladimir Putin puts all government kleptocrats to shame and is one of the richest men in the world. Trump wants very badly to emulate his good friend, Vladimir.

paragraphs.name: 66bd
paragraphs.text: I am no fan of Trump and would not be upset to see him impeached. There is nothing here though. Those who pursue this type of thing are embarrassing themselves. They are showing their hand too much. The American people don’t have much patience for those who are going to oppose someone no matter what. You can’t be outraged because he draws breath…

9e8e8d862aa1.title: While i am all for getting this idiot out of office I just don’t see this as a serious scenario.

paragraphs.name: 43be
paragraphs.text: While i am all for getting this idiot out of office I just don’t see this as a serious scenario. Maybe if we have a democratically controlled congress but with the way congress and supreme court is now it’s a waste of effort. Concentrate on voting anything with a R out of office at the federal, state and local levels. That is a plan worthy of effort.
